languages.text: "Отнюдь. Толкователь — столь редкое и сложное творение Омниссии, что ни я, ни мои коллеги не посмели бы нарушить его целостность. Если желаете, передайте его своим техножрецам — пускай они удостоверятся, что никаких подслушивающих устройств в нем не находится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс качает головой.{/n} "Отнюдь. Толкователь — столь редкое и сложное творение Омниссии, что ни я, ни мои коллеги не посмели бы нарушить его целостность. Если желаете, передайте его своим техножрецам — пускай они удостоверятся, что никаких подслушивающих устройств в нем не находится".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."
languages.original_text: "Отнюдь. Толкователь — столь редкое и сложное творение Омниссии, что ни я, ни мои коллеги не посмели бы нарушить его целостность. Если желаете, передайте его своим техножрецам — пускай они удостоверятся, что никаких подслушивающих устройств в нем не находится".

traits.locale_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “当然不是。阐释器是罕见而复杂的装置，是由欧姆尼塞亚亲手创造的。无论是我还是我的同事，都不会破坏它的结构。如果你愿意的话，你可以让你的技术神甫亲自确认一下里面有没有窃听装置。”
languages.original_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."

traits.locale_text: “当然不是。阐释器是罕见而复杂的装置，是由欧姆尼塞亚亲手创造的。无论是我还是我的同事，都不会破坏它的结构。如果你愿意的话，你可以让你的技术祭司亲自确认一下里面有没有窃听装置。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «En absoluto. El Dilucidador es una creación del Omnissiah tan singular y compleja que ni yo ni ninguno de mis colegas osaría alterar su integridad. Si lo desea, pida a sus tecnosacerdotes que confirmen que no hay dispositivos de escucha en su interior».
languages.original_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."

traits.locale_text: «En absoluto. El Dilucidador es una creación del Omnissiah tan singular y compleja que ni yo ni ninguno de mis colegas osaría alterar su integridad. Si lo desea, pida a sus tecnosacerdotes que confirmen que no hay dispositivos de escucha en su interior».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「違う。エルシデイターは万機神の創造物であり、我も同僚も、その完全性を損なおうなどとは夢にも思っていない。お望みなら、技術司祭に内部に盗聴器がないことを確認してもらうといい」
languages.original_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."

traits.locale_text: 「違う。エルシデイターは万機神の創造物であり、我も同僚も、その完全性を損なおうなどとは夢にも思っていない。お望みなら、技術司祭に内部に盗聴器がないことを確認してもらうといい」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Absolument pas. L'élucidateur est une création de l'Omnimessie, un appareil si rare et si complexe qu'il ne nous viendrait jamais à l'idée de compromettre son intégrité. Si vous craignez qu'il contienne des micros, vous pouvez toujours le faire inspecter par vos technoprêtres. »
languages.original_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."

traits.locale_text: « Absolument pas. L'élucidateur est une création de l'Omnimessie, un appareil si rare et si complexe qu'il ne nous viendrait jamais à l'idée de compromettre son intégrité. Si vous craignez qu'il contienne des micros, vous pouvez toujours le faire inspecter par vos technoprêtres. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Natürlich nicht. Der Elucidator ist eine derart seltene und komplexe Schöpfung des Omnissiah, dass weder ich noch einer meiner Kollegen auch nur im Traum daran denken würde, seine Integrität zu beeinträchtigen. Wenn Ihr wollt, dann lasst durch Eure Techpriester überprüfen, dass sich darin kein Abhörmechanismus befindet."
languages.original_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich nicht. Der Elucidator ist eine derart seltene und komplexe Schöpfung des Omnissiah, dass weder ich noch einer meiner Kollegen auch nur im Traum daran denken würde, seine Integrität zu beeinträchtigen. Wenn Ihr wollt, dann lasst durch Eure Techpriester überprüfen, dass sich darin kein Abhörmechanismus befindet."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."

languages.text: "Kesinlikle değil. Aydınlatıcı; Hermesih'in ellerinden çıkmış, öyle nadir ve karmaşık bir cihazdır ki ben de meslektaşlarım da onun bütünlüğünü tehlikeye atmayı aklımızdan dahi geçiremeyiz. Dilersen Tekno Rahiplerinden içinde dinleme cihazı olmadığının onayını alabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Certainly not. The Elucidator is such a rare and complex creation of the Omnissiah that neither I nor any of my colleagues would dream of compromising its integrity. If you wish, have your Tech-Priests confirm that there are no listening devices inside."
